channel.title: Making starters only work once?

item.title: Making starters only work once?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

1 sec…i put it like this…

if (command.startsWith(“starter”))
{
addItem(995, 15000000);
}
if (starter == 0) {
starter = 1;

and over 100 errors came up
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Already got your starter, noob -.-”);

item.title: Making starters only work once?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

how would i make the starter kit only work once? ive got this command

[tt]if (command.startsWith(“starter”))
{
addItem(995, 15000000);
}[/tt]
what do i do to make it work only once?
